bannerContent.heading: Weddings & Social Events
bannerContent.subcontent: Your dream destination for unforgettable celebrations
bannerContent.content: Our resort is the perfect destination wedding venue, hosting royal weddings, grand receptions, and private social events. Spacious halls, lush lawns, premium décor, and complete wedding packages ensure your special day is truly memorable.

bannerContent.heading: Live Entertainment & Performers
bannerContent.subcontent: Where nights come alive with music and laughter
bannerContent.content: Weekend live concerts, DJ parties, comedy nights, and cultural shows make the resort a vibrant entertainment hub. Ticketed events attract audiences while boosting F&B sales, with easy integration for online booking platforms.

bannerContent.heading: Corporate Tie-Ups + Co-working Spaces
bannerContent.content: Our resort offers versatile halls and meeting spaces for corporate events, conferences, workshops, and team-building activities. In addition, modern co-working spaces provide freelancers and startups with a productive environment, combining business efficiency with the resort’s serene ambiance.

bannerContent.heading: Film, Ad & OTT Shooting Location
bannerContent.subcontent: Premium location for cinematic and commercial productions
bannerContent.content: Our resort provides stunning settings for films, OTT series, advertisements, and brand campaigns. With versatile indoor and outdoor spaces, professional crews can capture cinematic shots, commercial visuals, and digital content in a fully equipped, picturesque environment.

services.title: Weddings & Social Events
services.description: The Sal Wood Resort is the perfect destination to celebrate life’s special moments. From weddings and receptions to private gatherings, our elegant lawns and premium décor set the stage for unforgettable memories. Our team ensures every event is crafted with a touch of luxury.
